name: ListShortCode
description: Retrieve a list of short-codes belonging to the account used to make the request

AccountSid.description: The SID of the [Account](https://www.twilio.com/docs/iam/api/account) that created the ShortCode resource(s) to read.

FriendlyName.description: The string that identifies the ShortCode resources to read.

ShortCode.description: Only show the ShortCode resources that match this pattern. You can specify partial numbers and use '*' as a wildcard for any digit.

PageSize.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.

Page.description: The page index. This value is simply for client state.

PageToken.description: The page token. This is provided by the API.
